resources.string: Welcome to the Washington Park Arboretum interactive map. This map contains plant locations and data for the entire living collection, or curated trees and shrubs, growing in the Arboretum. You may tab on a place on the map to see the plants inforamtion. You also can search a plant by name, family or scientific name to see its location on the map.
Find plants nearby your current location or enter a search below to find something more specific.
